title: Unable to edit photos taken with lens blur on Google Pixel XL. Says 'error saving photo' when saving
content: I am unable to do any edits to photos taken with the feature Lens Blur on my Google Pixel XL. I am able to take photos using this feature just fine. But if I try to do any edits (crop, filters, contrast, etc.) I am unable to save the photo. When I go to save it says 'error saving photo' at the bottom of the screen. This just started happening in the last week.
